code: import axios from'axios';export const getDataApi=async(url,token)=>{const res=await axios.get("/api/".concat(url),{headers:{Authorization:token}});return res;};export const postDataApi=async(url,post,token)=>{const res=await axios.post("/api/".concat(url),post,{headers:{Authorization:token}});return res;};export const putDataApi=async(url,post,token)=>{const res=await axios.put("/api/".concat(url),post,{headers:{Authorization:token}});return res;};export const patchDataApi=async(url,post,token)=>{const res=await axios.patch("/api/".concat(url),post,{headers:{Authorization:token}});return res;};export const deleteDataApi=async(url,token)=>{const res=await axios.delete("/api/".concat(url),{headers:{Authorization:token}});return res;};
